alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 7:42PM CDT until July 16 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Evangeline, or near Jennings, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowley, Jennings, Welsh, Iota, Mermentau, Evangeline, Morse, Mowata, Maxie, Egan, Lyons Point, Estherwood, Roanoke, Hathaway and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 56 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
